textAfterTable: Declare your allegiance to the Targaryens in the Game of Thrones Targaryen Women's T-Shirt. The Targaryens are the blood of the dragon, descended from the high lords of the ancient Freehold of Valyria. Represented by a three headed dragon symbolizing Aegon and his sisters, the Targaryen words are: "Fire and Blood," so don your Game of Thrones Targaryen Women's T-Shirt and prepare for battle. S M L XL XXL Bust 15" 16" 17" 18" 19" Waist 14" 15" 16" 17" 18" Length 24" 25" 26" 27" 28" Doubling the Bust measurement will give the chest size.
